name: MagicDevs LTD
tagline: We deliver mobile app solutions and websites
description:
Based in Armenia/Yerevan, with delivery capabilities from their Ottawa location, MagicDevs is a custom software development company that partners with firms to build cutting edge, high quality technology. The MagicDevs team are mobile experts with a portfolio of more than 150 software applications, and offices in two countries.
Key Services:
Mobile Application Development (Android, iOS, Windows Phone Applications)
Web Application Development
Cross Platform App Development
Ecommerce Development
Enterprise Solutions
Emerging Technology Services (IoT, Wearables, iBeacon, Augmented Reality, Cloud Solutions etc.)
For more information, visit magicdevs.com
